text:
Hi all, I have just started in this HubSpot world, I have recently started an implementation and I am about to import all my historical data from my business.
This information consists of 3 main entities: Products, Contacts and Purchases to relate the first 2 entities, at the moment I am undecided about which Object/Entity to use in the CRM, I notice that there are Quotes, Orders, Line items, etc. but they do not fit my need at all.
Is there already an object for it and I can't find it?
Do you think it is convenient to create a custom object?
What do you recommend?
Thank you in advance! good day to you all
Hey, I believe that that there's no prebuilt object for Products and Purchases HOWEVER this entities sounds like the HubSpot Line Items and Orders respectively.
For Products I understand that there is an entity, but not for Purchases. I will take another look at Orders Docs, Thanks Christensen!
